testMod:Cycle.NAME: Cycle
testMod:Cycle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this ends the turn in your hand, draw an extra card next turn.

testMod:Convalesce.NAME: Convalesce
testMod:Convalesce.DESCRIPTION: [#9b27e3]Soul Heal[] !M!. NL If this ends the turn in your hand, lose !D! HP

testMod:PunishWeakness.NAME: Punish Weakness
testMod:PunishWeakness.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Deal !D! damage for each Weak the enemy has.

testMod:SoulGuard.NAME: Soul Guard
testMod:SoulGuard.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, [#9b27e3]Soul Heal[] !M!.

testMod:EscalatingStrike.NAME: Escalating Strike
testMod:EscalatingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Your cards containing "Strike" deal !M! additional damage this combat.

testMod:DarkRitual.NAME: Dark Ritual
testMod:DarkRitual.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] for every !M! testmod:Dark you have

testMod:BurningBlood.NAME: Burning Blood
testMod:BurningBlood.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you heal, deal that much damage to a random enemy.

testMod:Thrashing.NAME: Thrashing
testMod:Thrashing.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain !M! Thorns.

testMod:BurnOut.NAME: BurnOut
testMod:BurnOut.DESCRIPTION: Deal testmod:Light damage to an enemy. Reduce your Light by 1. NL Repeat until you are out of Light.
testMod:BurnOut.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! testmod:Light. NL Deal testmod:Light damage to an enemy. Reduce your Light by 1. NL Repeat until you are out of Light.

testMod:Reprisal.NAME: Reprisal
testMod:Reprisal.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage to a monster equal to the amount of attack it has.
testMod:Reprisal.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage to a monster equal to the amount of attack it has. NL Then apply !M! Weak.

testMod:DarkBlock.NAME: Dark Block
testMod:DarkBlock.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to your testmod:Dark plus !B!. NL (Gain !testMod:DARK_TIMES_MAGIC_PLUS_BLOCK! Block total.)
testMod:DarkBlock.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to !M! times your testmod:Dark plus !B!. NL (Gain !testMod:DARK_TIMES_MAGIC_PLUS_BLOCK! Block total.)

testMod:LightAttack.NAME: Light Attack
testMod:LightAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your testmod:Light plus !D!. NL (Deal !testMod:LIGHT_TIMES_MAGIC_PLUS_DAMAGE! damage total.)
testMod:LightAttack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !M! times your testmod:Light plus !D!. NL (Deal !testMod:LIGHT_TIMES_MAGIC_PLUS_DAMAGE! damage total.)

testMod:Masochism.NAME: Masochism
testMod:Masochism.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL [#9b27e3]Soul Heal[] !B!. NL Exhaust.

testMod:VampireBat.NAME: Vampire Bat
testMod:VampireBat.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL [#9b27e3]Soul Heal[] !M!. NL Draw Vampire Bat from your draw pile whenever you heal.

testMod:PurgeTheSinful.NAME: Purge the Sinful
testMod:PurgeTheSinful.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, gain 1 [#feffd9]testmod:Light[] permanently. NL Exhaust.

testMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
testMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

testMod:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
testMod:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
testMod:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

testMod:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
testMod:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

testMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
testMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !testMod:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

testMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
testMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !testMod:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
